Kaho ``My name is Kaho Kuwagami, the deputy head of the Yin and Yang club at Hyakki Yako Rengo Gakuin. Big?"
Yin and Yang invites you to your own city (if you accept, the location of the other country's nearby city will be revealed)
Invited Yin and Yang to your home city.
Onmyoji proposes a map exchange.
Chise: "Don't worry about me, just do your job."
Kaho: "Fufufu, thank you very much. It was good."
Kaho "Uh...suddenly..." (Rejected declaration of friendship)
Kaho: "Someday, please come to the Hyakki Yakou's Onmyoubu. We promise you the best hospitality. Niya-sama and Chise-chan will surely be delighted."
Kaho: "My heart is beating so fast... umm... it's the first time I've felt it."
Kaho "Hyakki Yako goods... where shall we display them?"
Chise: "...the sky is blue."
Chise: "Evil spirits extermination, extermination of evil spirits."
Niya: "Nyahaha... well, shall we go see how you've done?"
Chise: "Let's burn it for now."
Chise: "I'm tired... Huh..."
Chise: "Something...it's all over before you know it."
Chise: "That thing just now... was it a dream?"
Chise: "Something...it's all over before you know it."
Chise "Lose?...When?" (Peace talks refused)
Kaho: "Because I'm not good enough... I've ruined the name of Hyakki Yako. I'm sorry... I'm sorry."
Kaho: "Because I'm not good enough... I've ruined the name of Hyakki Yako. I'm sorry... I'm sorry."

Suitable for the "gossip" agenda of the Yin-Yang department (proactive in declaration of friendship, opening of borders, dispatch of envoys, establishment of embassies)
Contrary to the Yin-Yang Department's agenda "gossip" (reluctant to declare friendship, open borders, dispatch envoys, and establish an embassy)

Contrary to the Yin-Yang department's agenda "Human Lover" (meaning the golden age)

Contrary to Yin-Yang's agenda "territorial expansionist" (smaller territory)
Appropriate for the Yin-Yang Agenda "Flat Earth Theorists" (Reluctant to the Space Race)
Contrary to the Yin-Yang Department's agenda "Flat Earth Theorists" (active in the space race)

Against the Yin-Yang agenda "Great White Fleet" (weak navy)
Fits the yin-yang agenda "demagogue" (low diplomatic support)
Contrary to the Yin-Yang Department's agenda "Demagogue" (high diplomatic support)

Contrary to the Yin-Yang department's agenda "tourism-oriented country" (high tourism power)
Fits the Yin-Yang agenda "religious intolerance" (same religion)
It went against the Yin-Yang department's agenda "religious intolerance" (different religion)
Fits the yin-yang agenda "libertarian" (fewer diplomatic victory points)
Contrary to Yin-Yang's agenda "Libertarian" (more diplomatic victory points)
Fits the yin and yang agenda "looters" (lots of looted tiles)
Against the yin-yang agenda "plunderer" (fewer tiles looted)
Fits the Yin-Yang department's agenda "Bear Enclosure" (not conquering another civilization's capital)
Goes against the Yin-Yang Department's agenda "Bear Enclosure" (conquering another civilization's capital)
Fits into the Onmyoubu agenda "zealots" (believing in a religion founded by the Onmyoubu)
Contrary to the Onmyoubu agenda "zealots" (does not believe in the religion founded by the Onmyobu)
Fits the Yin-Yang department's agenda "Miserable" (high gold income)
Goes against Yin-Yang's agenda "Miserable" (less gold income)
